archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1993-1994

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.962, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1996 November 25.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by John Thomas Casteen, the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
SERIES I: General Files, 1993-1994 Boxes 1-56
SERIES II: Semi-Permanent Files, 1931-1995 Boxes 57-71
SERIES III: University Committees Files, 1982-1995 Box 71
SERIES IV: Task Force, 1986-1995 Boxes 72-76
SERIES V: Restricted Files, 1951-1995 Boxes 77-80
